name: Yellow Battle (First DEMO)
description:
It was an ordinary day in LoneVille ...

... A boy was playing with his brother normally, when out of curiosity, they find a machine that was put there by the government but with warnings, they disobey the warnings, they enter, and the boy for lack of care, ends up falling into a construction site not finalized. Now, he is somewhere unknown, and he needs to find the way out.

Together, he finds a girl, now it is necessary to take care of her in this adventure.

YELLOW BATTLE by Wesley da S.
